scripts.install: npm run configure && npm run rebuild
scripts.rebuild: cd $INIT_CWD/src/vendor/tnef && make clean && make && cd $INIT_CWD && node-gyp clean && node-gyp rebuild
scripts.configure: echo $INIT_CWD && cd $INIT_CWD/src/vendor/tnef && autoreconf -f -i && ./configure && cd $INIT_CWD && node-gyp configure
